verses.verse: Therefore, thou son <S%H1121><s%> of man <S%H120><s%>, prophesy <S%H5012><s%> against Gog <S%H1463><s%>, and say <S%H559><s%>, Thus saith <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD <S%H3069><s%>; Behold, I am against thee, O Gog <S%H1463><s%>, the chief <S%H7218><s%> prince <S%H5387><s%> of Meshech <S%H4902><s%> and Tubal <S%H8422><s%>:

And I will turn thee back <S%H7725><s%>, and leave but the sixth part <S%H8338><s%> of thee, and will cause thee to come up <S%H5927><s%> from the north <S%H6828><s%> parts <S%H3411><s%>, and will bring <S%H935><s%> thee upon the mountains <S%H2022><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>:

And I will smite <S%H5221><s%> thy bow <S%H7198><s%> out of thy left <S%H8040><s%> hand <S%H3027><s%>, and will cause thine arrows <S%H2671><s%> to fall <S%H5307><s%> out of thy right <S%H3225><s%> hand <S%H3027><s%>.

Thou shalt fall <S%H5307><s%> upon the mountains <S%H2022><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, thou, and all thy bands <S%H102><s%>, and the people <S%H5971><s%> that is with thee: I will give <S%H5414><s%> thee unto the ravenous <S%H5861><s%> birds <S%H6833><s%> of every sort <S%H3671><s%>, and to the beasts <S%H2416><s%> of the field <S%H7704><s%> to be devoured <S%H402><s%>.
Thou shalt fall <S%H5307><s%> upon the open <S%H6440><s%> field <S%H7704><s%>: for I have spoken <S%H1696><s%> it, saith <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD <S%H3069><s%>.

And I will send <S%H7971><s%> a fire <S%H784><s%> on Magog <S%H4031><s%>, and among them that dwell <S%H3427><s%> carelessly <S%H983><s%> in the isles <S%H339><s%>: and they shall know <S%H3045><s%> that I am the LORD <S%H3068><s%>.

So will I make my holy <S%H6944><s%> name <S%H8034><s%> known <S%H3045><s%> in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of my people <S%H5971><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%>; and I will not let them pollute <S%H2490><s%> my holy <S%H6944><s%> name <S%H8034><s%> any more: and the heathen <S%H1471><s%> shall know <S%H3045><s%> that I am the LORD <S%H3068><s%>, the Holy One <S%H6918><s%> in Israel <S%H3478><s%>.
¶ Behold, it is come <S%H935><s%>, and it is done <S%H1961><s%>, saith <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD <S%H3069><s%>; this is the day <S%H3117><s%> whereof I have spoken <S%H1696><s%>.

And they that dwell <S%H3427><s%> in the cities <S%H5892><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> shall go forth <S%H3318><s%>, and shall set <S%H1197><s%> on fire <S%H784><s%> and burn <S%H5400><s%> the weapons <S%H5402><s%>, both the shields <S%H4043><s%> and the bucklers <S%H6793><s%>, the bows <S%H7198><s%> and the arrows <S%H2671><s%>, and the handstaves <S%H3027><s%> <S%H4731><s%>, and the spears <S%H7420><s%>, and they shall burn <S%H1197><s%> them with fire <S%H784><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> years <S%H8141><s%>:

So that they shall take <S%H5375><s%> no wood <S%H6086><s%> out of the field <S%H7704><s%>, neither cut down <S%H2404><s%> any out of the forests <S%H3293><s%>; for they shall burn <S%H1197><s%> the weapons <S%H5402><s%> with fire <S%H784><s%>: and they shall spoil <S%H7997><s%> those that spoiled <S%H7997><s%> them, and rob <S%H962><s%> those that robbed <S%H962><s%> them, saith <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD <S%H3069><s%>.

¶ And it shall come to pass in that day <S%H3117><s%>, that I will give <S%H5414><s%> unto Gog <S%H1463><s%> a place <S%H4725><s%> there of graves <S%H6913><s%> in Israel <S%H3478><s%>, the valley <S%H1516><s%> of the passengers <S%H5674><s%> on the east <S%H6926><s%> of the sea <S%H3220><s%>: and it shall stop <S%H2629><s%> the noses of the passengers <S%H5674><s%>: and there shall they bury <S%H6912><s%> Gog <S%H1463><s%> and all his multitude <S%H1995><s%>: and they shall call <S%H7121><s%> it The valley <S%H1516><s%> of Hamon-gog <S%H1996><s%>.
And seven <S%H7651><s%> months <S%H2320><s%> shall the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> be burying <S%H6912><s%> of them, that they may cleanse <S%H2891><s%> the land <S%H776><s%>.

Yea, all the people <S%H5971><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> shall bury <S%H6912><s%> them; and it shall be to them a renown <S%H8034><s%> the day <S%H3117><s%> that I shall be glorified <S%H3513><s%>, saith <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD <S%H3069><s%>.

And they shall sever out <S%H914><s%> men <S%H582><s%> of continual employment <S%H8548><s%>, passing through <S%H5674><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> to bury <S%H6912><s%> with the passengers <S%H5674><s%> those that remain <S%H3498><s%> upon the face <S%H6440><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%>, to cleanse <S%H2891><s%> it: after the end <S%H7097><s%> of seven <S%H7651><s%> months <S%H2320><s%> shall they search <S%H2713><s%>.

And the passengers <S%H5674><s%> that pass through <S%H5674><s%> the land <S%H776><s%>, when any seeth <S%H7200><s%> a man's <S%H120><s%> bone <S%H6106><s%>, then shall he set up <S%H1129><s%> a sign <S%H6725><s%> by <S%H681><s%> it, till the buriers <S%H6912><s%> have buried <S%H6912><s%> it in the valley <S%H1516><s%> of Hamon-gog <S%H1996><s%>.
And also the name <S%H8034><s%> of the city <S%H5892><s%> shall be Hamonah <S%H1997><s%>. Thus shall they cleanse <S%H2891><s%> the land <S%H776><s%>.

¶ And, thou son <S%H1121><s%> of man <S%H120><s%>, thus saith <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD <S%H3069><s%>; Speak <S%H559><s%> unto every feathered <S%H3671><s%> fowl <S%H6833><s%>, and to every beast <S%H2416><s%> of the field <S%H7704><s%>, Assemble <S%H6908><s%> yourselves, and come <S%H935><s%>; gather <S%H622><s%> yourselves on every side <S%H5439><s%> to my sacrifice <S%H2077><s%> that I do sacrifice <S%H2076><s%> for you, even a great <S%H1419><s%> sacrifice <S%H2077><s%> upon the mountains <S%H2022><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, that ye may eat <S%H398><s%> flesh <S%H1320><s%>, and drink <S%H8354><s%> blood <S%H1818><s%>.

Ye shall eat <S%H398><s%> the flesh <S%H1320><s%> of the mighty <S%H1368><s%>, and drink <S%H8354><s%> the blood <S%H1818><s%> of the princes <S%H5387><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%>, of rams <S%H352><s%>, of lambs <S%H3733><s%>, and of goats <S%H6260><s%>, of bullocks <S%H6499><s%>, all of them fatlings <S%H4806><s%> of Bashan <S%H1316><s%>.

And ye shall eat <S%H398><s%> fat <S%H2459><s%> till ye be full <S%H7654><s%>, and drink <S%H8354><s%> blood <S%H1818><s%> till ye be drunken <S%H7943><s%>, of my sacrifice <S%H2077><s%> which I have sacrificed <S%H2076><s%> for you.

Thus ye shall be filled <S%H7646><s%> at my table <S%H7979><s%> with horses <S%H5483><s%> and chariots <S%H7393><s%>, with mighty men <S%H1368><s%>, and with all men <S%H376><s%> of war <S%H4421><s%>, saith <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD <S%H3069><s%>.

And I will set <S%H5414><s%> my glory <S%H3519><s%> among the heathen <S%H1471><s%>, and all the heathen <S%H1471><s%> shall see <S%H7200><s%> my judgment <S%H4941><s%> that I have executed <S%H6213><s%>, and my hand <S%H3027><s%> that I have laid <S%H7760><s%> upon them.
So the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> shall know <S%H3045><s%> that I am the LORD <S%H3068><s%> their God <S%H430><s%> from that day <S%H3117><s%> and forward <S%H1973><s%>.

¶ And the heathen <S%H1471><s%> shall know <S%H3045><s%> that the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> went into captivity <S%H1540><s%> for their iniquity <S%H5771><s%>: because they trespassed <S%H4603><s%> against me, therefore hid <S%H5641><s%> I my face <S%H6440><s%> from them, and gave <S%H5414><s%> them into the hand <S%H3027><s%> of their enemies <S%H6862><s%>: so fell <S%H5307><s%> they all by the sword <S%H2719><s%>.
According to their uncleanness <S%H2932><s%> and according to their transgressions <S%H6588><s%> have I done <S%H6213><s%> unto them, and hid <S%H5641><s%> my face <S%H6440><s%> from them.

Therefore thus saith <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD <S%H3069><s%>; Now will I bring again <S%H7725><s%> the captivity <S%H7622><s%> <S%H7622><s%> of Jacob <S%H3290><s%>, and have mercy <S%H7355><s%> upon the whole house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, and will be jealous <S%H7065><s%> for my holy <S%H6944><s%> name <S%H8034><s%>;

After that they have borne <S%H5375><s%> their shame <S%H3639><s%>, and all their trespasses <S%H4604><s%> whereby they have trespassed <S%H4603><s%> against me, when they dwelt <S%H3427><s%> safely <S%H983><s%> in their land <S%H127><s%>, and none made them afraid <S%H2729><s%>.

When I have brought them again <S%H7725><s%> from the people <S%H5971><s%>, and gathered <S%H6908><s%> them out of their enemies' <S%H341><s%> lands <S%H776><s%>, and am sanctified <S%H6942><s%> in them in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of many <S%H7227><s%> nations <S%H1471><s%>;

Then shall they know <S%H3045><s%> that I am the LORD <S%H3068><s%> their God <S%H430><s%>, which caused them to be led into captivity <S%H1540><s%> among the heathen <S%H1471><s%>: but I have gathered <S%H3664><s%> them unto their own land <S%H127><s%>, and have left <S%H3498><s%> none of them any more there.

Neither will I hide <S%H5641><s%> my face <S%H6440><s%> any more from them: for I have poured out <S%H8210><s%> my spirit <S%H7307><s%> upon the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, saith <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD <S%H3069><s%>.
